verses.verse: You also, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a tile, <S%H3843><s%> and lay <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> yourself, <S%H2710><s%> and portray on it a city, <S%H5892><s%> even Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Even thus shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> their bread <S%H3899><s%> unclean, <S%H2931><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> where I will drive them. <S%H5080><s%>

Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> behold, <S%H7665><s%> I will break the staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> by weight, <S%H4948><s%> and with fearfulness; <S%H1674><s%> and they shall drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> by measure, <S%H4884><s%> and in dismay: <S%H8078><s%>

that they may want <S%H2637><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and water, <S%H4325><s%> and be dismayed <S%H8074><s%> one <S%H376><s%> with another, <S%H251><s%> and pine away <S%H4743><s%> in their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
